entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0130 refactoring sometimes also want to change other things in the document such as change variables to var #67480
  • [API proposal] Option for displaying standalone parameter names #67478

Closed

  • C# compilation fails: Process terminated. System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException #67091
    C# 12.0
  • GetDocumentationCommentXml gives different comments for same ISymbol #67477

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ExtractInterface to use IRefactoringHelpersService #67482
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor (#67092) #67481
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove unread field in the work coordinator. #67476
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support in LSP code for hosting workspaces that don't keep an independent view of the current solution. #67443
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Gracefully handle unexpected NullableWalker state #67453
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Run analyzers only for requested span #67236
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove automatic background compiling/parsing in roslyn. #67474
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove concept of metadata assemblies that we dump to recoverable storage. #67470
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change inline hint to inline hints #67475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't show expanded items in certain cases #67049
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #67078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP #67392
    Area-Analyzers
  • Null coalescing assignment for nullable value type should set state of nullable type not underlying type #67468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
